projectDesc.p: The Göttingen Register of Electronic Texts in Indian Languages (GRETIL) is a resource platform providing standardized machine-readable texts in Indian languages that have been contributed by various individuals and institutions.

correction.p: Apparent errors have been silently corrected.

normalization.p: GRETIL normalizes all texts contributed consistently for each language. Sanskrit texts are normalized in accordance with the scheme of the International Alphabet of Sanskrit Transliteration (IAST) in order to facilitate word search across its corpus without additional transformations.

All characters that were fully equivalent to an IAST-conformant character in the text file contributed have been made to conform to the character list below. Non-conformant characters with additional information including accents, capitalization, and whitespace have been preserved as orig elements inside choice elements with their IAST-conformant equivalent in reg elements for the creation of a plain text. These additional informations will be available only in those transformations of this file that display the original information.

quotation.p: If indicated unambiguously in the text file contributed quotation marks have been replaced with the q element and, in case a reference was provided, have been nested inside a cit with the respective reference provided in a ref element after the quote.

segmentation.p: Unnumbered div elements are used to structure the text, using the type and n attributes in accordance with the refsDecl.

interpretation.p:
Interpretive markup which is visible only in analytic transformations of this file consists of:
Highlighting in hi elements,
Corruptions in sic elements,
Remarks in note elements with the @resp attribute identifying the agency.

lg.l: śubhamālakṣya kṛtā vai kāścidāryāgītayastvayā ca śravyāḥ // Sl_1 //
dārumayī hyapi pratimā sampūjyate kāpi sugatasya vidvadbhiḥ /
tathāmanojñaṃ kāvyaṃ saddharmāśrayācca mamedaṃ na nindyam // Sl_2 //
ākalpitaṃ tu sudhayā nanvatidhavalaṃ na dṛśyate candrikayā? // Sl_3 //
dānaṃ deyaṃ vidhinā janmāntareṣu na dānāt paraṃ mitram // Sl_6 //
carācarapratiṣṭhaṃ tu guṇāśrayaṃ bhūvacca rājate śīlam // Sl_7 //
aprameyāḥ saṃvardhya bhavecca bhavasāgarapārago jinendraḥ // Sl_8 //
yatra pūjā pitṝṇāṃ kulaṃ tadācāryabrahmabhiḥ samṛddham /
labhate hi pumān strī vā suramyakāmāvacarādidevakāyam // Sl_11 //
kṣāntisamaṃ naiva tapastatastvayā na krodhāvasaro deyaḥ /
vairairebhiḥ kalahastyajati ya etad vairaṃ sa sukhaṃ śete // Sl_16 //
jale 'vanau pāṣāṇe citramiva cittaṃ tridhā khalu sattvānām /
kleśavatāṃ hi prathamo dharmābhilāṣiṇāmantimo jyāyān // Sl_17 //
kramaśo madhuḥ puṣpāśucitulyāścaramā ca pariharttavyaitāsu // Sl_18 //
caturvidhā vai puruṣāḥ prakāśātprakāśe tamasastamasi punaḥ /
tamaḥ prakāśād gacchati tamasastejasi pudgalo varaḥ prathamaḥ // Sl_19 //
apakve 'pakvaṃ tathā pakve pakvamiva bhāti cāturvidhyam // Sl_20 //
paradārānna tu paśyed dṛṣṭe ca jñeyā avasthānurūpyeṇa /
pāśaistasya hi baddho bhavacārake lokaḥ sa prahātavyaḥ // Sl_23 //
calādhruvāṇi ṣaḍakṣāṇi jayanti samare vā śatrūnapi caike /
tayośca sudhiyaḥ prathamaṃ varamindriyavijetāraṃ ca manyante // Sl_24 //
carmāvṛtaduṣpūraṃ bhūṣitamapi bhūṣaṇaiḥ pṛthag draṣṭavyam // Sl_25 //
kṛmipīḍito hi kuṣṭhī sukhalipsayā ca yathā vahnimāśrayate /
pīḍā na yāti śāntiṃ tathaiva hi kāmāsaktirapi boddhavyā // Sl_26 //
paramārthaṃ prativettuṃ sarvabhāveṣu savidhi manasi nidhāyaiva /
sa ca khalu bhāvayitavyo na hi tattulyo 'paro guṇayuto dharmaḥ // Sl_27 //
sukulīno 'pi na pūjyo jñānaśīlavimukho śrutirūpavān pumān /
pāpaṃ nācaraṇiyaṃ yataḥ katamo 'pi na narakaphalasya bhāgī // Sl_30 //
na ca kṛntati pāpakarma tatkṣaṇamastrapātavat kamapi pāpinam /
mṛtyorhi samaye kintu tatkarmaṇaḥ phalamabhimukhībhavatyeva // Sl_31 //
apatrapā hrī muninā mudhaivāparadhanāni hi sādhāraṇāni // Sl_32 //
niśāviharaṇaṃ ṣaḍime tyājyā durgatidā yaśovināśakāśca // Sl_33 //
santoṣo 'nuṣṭheyaḥ dhanaṃ vinaiva sa dhanikaḥ sati santoṣe // Sl_34 //
yathā samṛddhāḥ puruṣā duḥkhino bhavanti naiva tathālpecchukāḥ /
yāvatyaḥ santi phaṇā ārya, duḥkhakarāḥ, nāgasya tāvatyaḥ // Sl_35 //
patnī tyājyā trividhā prakṛtyā ripusambaddhā svaghātikeva /
kāyasthityai nitarāṃ na ca saundaryagarvamānārthaṃ sevyam // Sl_38 //
dinamakhilaṃ śubhakārye yāpayed rātrerādyantau yāmau ca /
dhīman, madhye yāme śayīta yato hi na bhaved viphalā nidrā // Sl_39 //
kāmān prītivicārau sukhañca duḥkhañca vihāya caturbhireva /
pāpaṃ tathaiva cālpaṃ nāśayatyalpakuśalaṃ na pūrṇakuśalam // Sl_43 //
auddhatyaṃ kaukṛtyaṃ vyāpādaḥ styānamiddhe ca kāmecchā /
balendriyāṇi cāgryāṇi kathyante yatanīyameteṣu tasmād // Sl_45 //
punaḥ punastu cintayā pratipakṣeṇaivaṃ prahīyate mānaḥ // Sl_46 //
kṛtāni mithyādṛṣṭyā puruṣaiḥ sucaritānyapi viṣamavipākāni // Sl_47 //
uktaṃ rūpaṃ nātmā rūpavāṃśca nātmā rūpe naivātmā /
na cātmanyasti rūpaṃ śūnyamevaṃ skandhacatuṣkamapi jñeyam // Sl_49 //
skandhā na hi jāyante yadṛcchayā na prakṛtīśvarakālebhyaḥ /
nāhetoḥ svabhāvato jñeyā ajñānena tṛṣṇayā jātāḥ // Sl_50 //
kālaḥ pacati bhūtāni kālaḥ saṃharate prajāḥ /
kālaḥ supteṣu jāgarti kālo hi duratikramaḥ //
ātmāpekṣo mokṣaḥ parasmānna labhyate kimapi sāhāyyam /
rajaḥsadharmī cānte sadā viyogaśīlo naśvaro jñeyaḥ // Sl_56 //
dhūlimātraṃ hi mūrtāḥ kā kathā durbalavapuṣāṃ mānavānām // Sl_57 //
tato 'pyasāvatimūḍho yaśca nṛjanma labdhvāpi pāpamācarati // Sl_60 //
svakīyapūrvakuśalaṃ hyetaccakracatuṣkaṃ hi vidyate tvayi // Sl_61 //
sevyaḥ sadā supuruṣaḥ śamaḥ prāpto yato jinamapekṣya bahubhiḥ // Sl_62 //
mleccho jaḍaśca sattvo yo hyutpanno buddhavirahite // Sl_63 //
ebhī rahito bhūtvā kṣaṇaṃ labdhvā janmanivṛttau prayateta // Sl_64 //
virajya tataḥ śṛṇu tāvad doṣānetasyāvagacchan naradeva // Sl_65 //
mitratvena ca śatruḥ putratvena pitāmbā ca bhāryātvena /
parivartyotpadyante tasmānna niyataṃ kimapīha saṃsāre // Sl_66 //
pṛthagjanānanusṛtya hi punastato 'pyadhikañca pāsyanti lokāḥ // Sl_67 //
bhūmimṛdā badarāṇāṃ gulikābhirna gaṇanā sambhavāmbānām // Sl_68 //
lokapūjyo 'pi śakraḥ patati ca punaḥ karmavaśāddhi saṃsāre /
tadvacca cakravartī rājāpi punarbhavati hi dāso loke // Sl_69 //
cañcalakukkulakuṇapairgāḍhaṃ duḥkhaṃ cintayet sadā manasā // Sl_71 //
devāṅganāsevite nandane ramye copavane ca vihṛtya /
snātvā punaśca narake kṣāroṣṇodakavaitaraṇyāṃ hi patanti // Sl_73 //
prāpyāvīcau satataṃ labhyate 'gnerindhanībhūya ca duḥkham // Sl_74 //
padamavāpya suryendvoḥ svakāyaprabhayā pradīpya hi saṃsāram /
tamasi ca ghane praviṣṭaḥ prasāritamapi ca svīyakaraṃ na paśyati // Sl_75 //
rauravāvīcyādau hi saṃghāte cāpi narake sadā duḥkham // Sl_77 //
niṣpīḍyante tilavat kecanānye cūrṇavat peṣyante ca /
chidyante śāṇenānye dīryante tathā tīkṣṇaparaśunāpi // Sl_78 //
āropyante kecana sakaṇṭake taptāyase sadā śūle // Sl_79 //
utthāya karau vivaśā luñcyante tīkṣṇanakhatuṇḍaiśca kākaiḥ // Sl_80 //
vṛddhaṃ vraṇantvasahyaṃ bhakṣyamāṇaṃ rudanti cākulā bhūmyām // Sl_81 //
dahyante 'gnikuṇḍeṣu tena tadānanāni ca bhavanti vivṛtāni /
śvāsāvarodhasamaye pāpaḥ kālaṃkṛte ca narakaṃ prayāti /
śrutvāpi narakaduḥkhaṃ sahasraśo vajrasvabhāvātra bibheti // Sl_83 //
śrutvā dṛṣṭvā smṛtvā paṭhitvā cāpi citrāṅkanaṃ narakasya /
ākṛtirapi bhayajanikā kā kathā tadasahyavipākānubhavasya // Sl_84 //
yathā samastasukhānāṃ tṛṣṇākṣaya eva sarvottamaṃ sukhamiti /
ihaikasmiṃśca divase, triśataśūlaghātād bhavati ca yad duḥkham /
nārakīyaduḥkhasya hi tatrāpnoti samatāṃ na laghukalāṃ cāpi // Sl_86 //
yāvattānyakuśalāni na kṣīṇāni tāvatra jīvanānmuktiḥ // Sl_87 //
bhavataivaṃ yatanīyaṃ śaktyā yena tadaṇumātraṃ na śiṣyeta // Sl_88 //
tiryagyoniṣu nānā duḥkhāni bhavanti ca badhabandhanādīni /
yojyante khalu vivaśā anye padamuṣṭikaśāṅkuśaiḥ paśavaśca // Sl_90 //
pretayonau na kṣayaṃ yātīṣṭālābhajanitā duḥkhadhārā ca /
tacca pīḍitaṃ kṣudhayā kṣiptamaśuci vastu na pratikārakṣamam // Sl_92 //
nimnakoṭikaiḥ kaiścit pūyaraktādyaśucīni na ca labhyante /
candro grīṣme taptaḥ śaitye śīto bhānuśca hyetebhyaḥ /
teṣāṃ dṛṣṭi pātācca niṣphalāstaravo nadyaśca śuṣyante // Sl_95 //
na ca mriyante kecit pañca vā daśa sahasravarṣāṇi sattvāḥ // Sl_96 //
evaṃ vicintya tajjñaiḥ kṣaratsukhāya na tṛṣṇā kāryā svarge // Sl_98 //
vaivarṇyaṃ dehasya svāsane na ratirmlāyate 'pi mālā ca /
vasaneṣvapi daurgandhyaṃ svedaścāpūrvo niryāti dehāttu // Sl_99 //
na kurvanti dhīmanto janmāvaraṇācca te satyadarśanāni // Sl_102 //
janmagrahaṇamayuktaṃ bahubādhaṃ janma tatreti vijñeyam // Sl_103 //
jvalite śirasi ca vasane tannivṛttyupāyamupekṣya tvaritameva /
prajñābhāve dhyānaṃ dhyānābhāve 'pi na jāyate sā prajñā /
yatrobhe vidyete jñeyastasya bhavasāgaro goṣpadavat // Sl_107 //
loke na cintanīyā yato tairnāpnoti cittameva śāntim // Sl_108 //
evaṃ proktaṃ munināvidyayā karma karmaṇā ca vijñānam /
tasmācca nāmarūpaṃ tataḥ ṣaḍāyatanāni tataḥ sparśā vai // Sl_109 //
tata utpannā vittirvedanāśrayeṇa jāyate khalu tṛṣṇā /
tasyāścopādānaṃ tato bhavo 'pi bhavācca jāyate jātiḥ // Sl_110 //
duḥkhaskandho vipulaḥ sati jātiniṣedhe niṣiddhānīmāni // Sl_111 //
samyagimaṃ yaḥ paśyati sa ca paśyati tattvadarśinaṃ buddhameva // Sl_112 //
jātiriyaṃ duḥkhameva tṛṣṇā ca tasya samudayo mahān jñeyaḥ /
kroḍe śriyaśca yeṣāṃ gṛhasthāstaranti kleśanadīṃ jñānāt // Sl_115 //
nāvataranti ca gaganāt te 'pi pṛthagjanāḥ kleśavaśā hi pūrvam // Sl_116 //
cittaṃ hi dharmamūlaṃ bhagavatoktamatastadapi sādhu damayecca /
bho nirbhaya, kiṃ bahunā kathanena yato 'yameva hitopadeśaḥ // Sl_117 //
caryāguṇān sevasva śikṣāmācara jīvanaṃ ca kuru sārtham // Sl_118 //
sarveṣāṃ kuśalāni tu sarvārthamanumodya svacaryātrayīṃ ca /
buddhatvāya pariṇāmya tatastadanena puṇyarāśinā bhavatā // Sl_119 //
loke prasārya śamayan narān yuvatisukharatadevāṃśca bhūmau // Sl_122 //
